message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1500000, which reflects its potential and my confidence in its value to you.  If you're interested, please let me know, as I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial transaction.
